location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.5572 of 1852 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of Kemball's letter of 2 October 1852 (ff 170-171), and stating that His Lordship in Council approves of the terms of Kemball's reply to Sheikh Sultan bin Saqr of Ra-s al Khymah (ff 173-176).
